### ğŸ“‹ Checklist
<!-- Ensure all items are checked before submitting -->

#### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards

#### Medical Responsibility
- [ ] My changes maintain the educational focus of the application

- [ ] My changes do not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment

#### Documentation
